translations.chinese: 田單者，齊諸田疏屬也。
translations.literal: Tian Dan was a distant relative of the Tian clan of Qi.
translations.idiomatic: Tian Dan was a distant relative of the ruling Tian clan of Qi.

context.next: 湣王時，單為臨菑市掾，不見知。

translations.chinese: 湣王時，單為臨菑市掾，不見知。
translations.literal: During King Min's time, Dan served as market supervisor in Linzi, unrecognized.
translations.idiomatic: During King Min's reign, Tian Dan served as market supervisor in Linzi, where he went unrecognized.

context.previous: 田單者，齊諸田疏屬也。
context.next: 及燕使樂毅伐破齊，齊湣王出奔，已而保莒城。

translations.chinese: 及燕使樂毅伐破齊，齊湣王出奔，已而保莒城。
translations.literal: When Yan sent Yue Yi to attack and break Qi, Qi King Min fled, then defended Ju city.
translations.idiomatic: When Yan sent Le Yi to attack and defeat Qi, King Min of Qi fled, and afterward defended the city of Ju.

context.previous: 湣王時，單為臨菑市掾，不見知。
context.next: 燕師長驅平齊，而田單走安平，令其宗人盡斷其車軸末而傅鐵籠。

translations.chinese: 燕師長驅平齊，而田單走安平，令其宗人盡斷其車軸末而傅鐵籠。
translations.literal: Yan troops drove straight to pacify Qi, while Tian Dan fled to Anping, ordered his clansmen to all cut their chariot axle ends and fit iron casings.
translations.idiomatic: The Yan army drove straight ahead to pacify Qi, while Tian Dan fled to Anping and ordered his clansmen to cut off the ends of their chariot axles and fit them with iron casings.

context.previous: 及燕使樂毅伐破齊，齊湣王出奔，已而保莒城。
context.next: 已而燕軍攻安平，城壞，齊人走，爭涂，以折車敗，為燕所虜，唯田單宗人以鐵籠故得脫，東保即墨。

translations.chinese: 已而燕軍攻安平，城壞，齊人走，爭涂，以折車敗，為燕所虜，唯田單宗人以鐵籠故得脫，東保即墨。
translations.literal: Soon Yan army attacked Anping. City broken, Qi people fled, contended on roads, axes broke chariots, captured by Yan. Only Tian Dan's clansmen with iron casings escaped, east to defend Jimu.
translations.idiomatic: Soon the Yan army attacked Anping. The city fell, and the people of Qi fled, crowding the roads. Their chariot axles broke, and they were captured by Yan. Only Tian Dan's clansmen escaped thanks to their iron casings, and they went east to defend Jimo.

context.previous: 燕師長驅平齊，而田單走安平，令其宗人盡斷其車軸末而傅鐵籠。
context.next: 燕既盡降齊城，唯獨莒、即墨不下。

translations.chinese: 燕既盡降齊城，唯獨莒、即墨不下。
translations.literal: Yan having completely subdued Qi cities, only Ju and Jimu not fallen.
translations.idiomatic: Yan had completely subdued all the cities of Qi, with only Ju and Jimo holding out.

context.previous: 已而燕軍攻安平，城壞，齊人走，爭涂，以折車敗，為燕所虜，唯田單宗人以鐵籠故得脫，東保即墨。
context.next: 燕軍聞齊王在莒，并兵攻之。

translations.chinese: 燕軍聞齊王在莒，并兵攻之。
translations.literal: Yan army heard Qi king in Ju, combined forces attacked it.
translations.idiomatic: The Yan army heard that the King of Qi was in Ju and concentrated their forces to attack it.

context.previous: 燕既盡降齊城，唯獨莒、即墨不下。
context.next: 淖齒既殺湣王於莒，因堅守，距燕軍，數年不下。

translations.chinese: 淖齒既殺湣王於莒，因堅守，距燕軍，數年不下。
translations.literal: Zhao Chi having killed King Min in Ju, thus firmly defended, resisted Yan army, several years not fallen.
translations.idiomatic: Zhao Chi having killed King Min in Ju, thus firmly defended, resisted Yan army, several years not fallen.

context.previous: 燕軍聞齊王在莒，并兵攻之。
context.next: 燕引兵東圍即墨，即墨大夫出與戰，敗死。

translations.chinese: 燕引兵東圍即墨，即墨大夫出與戰，敗死。
translations.literal: Yan led troops east to besiege Jimu. Jimu officials went out to battle, defeated and died.
translations.idiomatic: Yan led troops east to besiege Jimu. Jimu officials went out to battle, defeated and died.

context.previous: 淖齒既殺湣王於莒，因堅守，距燕軍，數年不下。
context.next: 城中相與推田單，曰：「安平之戰，田單宗人以鐵籠得全，習兵。」

translations.chinese: 城中相與推田單，曰：「安平之戰，田單宗人以鐵籠得全，習兵。」
translations.literal: City people together promoted Tian Dan, saying: 'In Anping battle, Tian Dan's clansmen with iron casings survived, practiced in arms.'
translations.idiomatic: City people together promoted Tian Dan, saying: 'In Anping battle, Tian Dan's clansmen with iron casings survived, practiced in arms.'

context.previous: 燕引兵東圍即墨，即墨大夫出與戰，敗死。
context.next: 立以為將軍，以即墨距燕。

translations.chinese: 立以為將軍，以即墨距燕。
translations.literal: Established him as general, to defend Jimu against Yan.
translations.idiomatic: Established him as general, to defend Jimu against Yan.

context.previous: 城中相與推田單，曰：「安平之戰，田單宗人以鐵籠得全，習兵。」

translations.chinese: 頃之，燕昭王卒，惠王立，與樂毅有隙。
translations.literal: Soon, Yan King Zhao died, King Hui ascended, had rift with Yue Yi.
translations.idiomatic: Soon, Yan King Zhao died, King Hui ascended, had rift with Yue Yi.

context.next: 田單聞之，乃縱反閒於燕，宣言曰：「齊王已死，城之不拔者二耳。

translations.chinese: 田單聞之，乃縱反閒於燕，宣言曰：「齊王已死，城之不拔者二耳。
translations.literal: Tian Dan heard of this, spread false rumors in Yan, declaring: 'Qi king already dead, cities not fallen are two only.'
translations.idiomatic: Tian Dan heard of this, spread false rumors in Yan, declaring: 'Qi king already dead, cities not fallen are two only.'

context.previous: 頃之，燕昭王卒，惠王立，與樂毅有隙。
context.next: 樂毅畏誅而不敢歸，以伐齊為名，實欲連兵南面而王齊。

translations.chinese: 樂毅畏誅而不敢歸，以伐齊為名，實欲連兵南面而王齊。
translations.literal: Yue Yi fears execution dares not return, using attacking Qi as name, actually wishes to join forces facing south to become king of Qi.'
translations.idiomatic: Yue Yi fears execution dares not return, using attacking Qi as name, actually wishes to join forces facing south to become king of Qi.'

context.previous: 田單聞之，乃縱反閒於燕，宣言曰：「齊王已死，城之不拔者二耳。
context.next: 齊人未附，故且緩攻即墨以待其事。

translations.chinese: 齊人未附，故且緩攻即墨以待其事。
translations.literal: Qi people not attached, thus slowly attacks Jimu awaiting the matter.'
translations.idiomatic: Qi people not attached, thus slowly attacks Jimu awaiting the matter.'

context.previous: 樂毅畏誅而不敢歸，以伐齊為名，實欲連兵南面而王齊。
context.next: 齊人所懼，唯恐他將之來，即墨殘矣。」

translations.chinese: 齊人所懼，唯恐他將之來，即墨殘矣。」
translations.literal: What Qi fears is only other generals coming, then Jimu finished.'
translations.idiomatic: What Qi fears is only other generals coming, then Jimu finished.'

context.previous: 齊人未附，故且緩攻即墨以待其事。
context.next: 燕王以為然，使騎劫代樂毅。

translations.chinese: 燕王以為然，使騎劫代樂毅。
translations.literal: Yan king considered it true, sent Ji Jie to replace Yue Yi.
translations.idiomatic: Yan king considered it true, sent Ji Jie to replace Yue Yi.

context.previous: 齊人所懼，唯恐他將之來，即墨殘矣。」

translations.chinese: 樂毅因歸趙，燕人士卒忿。
translations.literal: Yue Yi thus went to Zhao, Yan officers and soldiers resentful.
translations.idiomatic: Yue Yi thus went to Zhao, Yan officers and soldiers resentful.

context.next: 而田單乃令城中人食必祭其先祖於庭，飛鳥悉翔舞城中下食。

translations.chinese: 而田單乃令城中人食必祭其先祖於庭，飛鳥悉翔舞城中下食。
translations.literal: Tian Dan then ordered city people when eating must sacrifice to ancestors in courtyards, flying birds all soared and danced eating in city.
translations.idiomatic: Tian Dan then ordered city people when eating must sacrifice to ancestors in courtyards, flying birds all soared and danced eating in city.

context.previous: 樂毅因歸趙，燕人士卒忿。
context.next: 燕人怪之。

translations.chinese: 燕人怪之。
translations.literal: Yan people considered it strange.
translations.idiomatic: Yan people considered it strange.

context.previous: 而田單乃令城中人食必祭其先祖於庭，飛鳥悉翔舞城中下食。
context.next: 田單因宣言曰：「神來下教我。」

translations.chinese: 田單因宣言曰：「神來下教我。」
translations.literal: Tian Dan thus declared: 'Spirit comes down to teach me.'
translations.idiomatic: Tian Dan thus declared: 'Spirit comes down to teach me.'

context.previous: 燕人怪之。
context.next: 乃令城中人曰：「當有神人為我師。」

translations.chinese: 乃令城中人曰：「當有神人為我師。」
translations.literal: Then ordered city people: 'There should be a spirit person to be my teacher.'
translations.idiomatic: Then ordered city people: 'There should be a spirit person to be my teacher.'

context.previous: 田單因宣言曰：「神來下教我。」
context.next: 有一卒曰：「臣可以為師乎？」

translations.chinese: 有一卒曰：「臣可以為師乎？」
translations.literal: One soldier said: 'Can I be the teacher?'
translations.idiomatic: One soldier said: 'Can I be the teacher?'

context.previous: 乃令城中人曰：「當有神人為我師。」
context.next: 因反走。

translations.chinese: 因反走。
translations.literal: Thus ran backward.
translations.idiomatic: Thus ran backward.

context.previous: 有一卒曰：「臣可以為師乎？」
context.next: 田單乃起，引還，東鄉坐，師事之。

translations.chinese: 田單乃起，引還，東鄉坐，師事之。
translations.literal: Tian Dan rose, led him back, faced east sat, treated him as teacher.
translations.idiomatic: Tian Dan rose, led him back, faced east sat, treated him as teacher.

context.previous: 因反走。
context.next: 卒曰：「臣欺君，誠無能也。」

translations.chinese: 卒曰：「臣欺君，誠無能也。」
translations.literal: Soldier said: 'I deceived you, truly incapable.'
translations.idiomatic: Soldier said: 'I deceived you, truly incapable.'

context.previous: 田單乃起，引還，東鄉坐，師事之。
context.next: 田單曰：「子勿言也！」

translations.chinese: 田單曰：「子勿言也！」
translations.literal: Tian Dan said: 'Do not speak!'
translations.idiomatic: Tian Dan said: 'Do not speak!'

context.previous: 卒曰：「臣欺君，誠無能也。」
context.next: 因師之。

translations.chinese: 因師之。
translations.literal: Thus treated him as teacher.
translations.idiomatic: Thus treated him as teacher.

context.previous: 田單曰：「子勿言也！」
context.next: 每出約束，必稱神師。

translations.chinese: 每出約束，必稱神師。
translations.literal: Whenever going out to give orders, must call divine teacher.
translations.idiomatic: Whenever going out to give orders, must call divine teacher.

context.previous: 因師之。
context.next: 乃宣言曰：「吾唯懼燕軍之劓所得齊卒，置之前行，與我戰，即墨敗矣。」

translations.chinese: 乃宣言曰：「吾唯懼燕軍之劓所得齊卒，置之前行，與我戰，即墨敗矣。」
translations.literal: Then declared: 'I only fear Yan army will cut noses of captured Qi soldiers, place them in front, battle with me, then Jimu defeated.'
translations.idiomatic: Then declared: 'I only fear Yan army will cut noses of captured Qi soldiers, place them in front, battle with me, then Jimu defeated.'

context.previous: 每出約束，必稱神師。
context.next: 燕人聞之，如其言。

translations.chinese: 燕人聞之，如其言。
translations.literal: Yan heard this, did as said.
translations.idiomatic: Yan heard this, did as said.

context.previous: 乃宣言曰：「吾唯懼燕軍之劓所得齊卒，置之前行，與我戰，即墨敗矣。」
context.next: 城中人見齊諸降者盡劓，皆怒，堅守，唯恐見得。

translations.chinese: 城中人見齊諸降者盡劓，皆怒，堅守，唯恐見得。
translations.literal: City people saw all surrendered Qi with cut noses, all angered, firmly defended, feared being captured.
translations.idiomatic: City people saw all surrendered Qi with cut noses, all angered, firmly defended, feared being captured.

context.previous: 燕人聞之，如其言。
context.next: 單又縱反閒曰：「吾懼燕人掘吾城外冢墓，僇先人，可為寒心。」

translations.chinese: 單又縱反閒曰：「吾懼燕人掘吾城外冢墓，僇先人，可為寒心。」
translations.literal: Dan again spread false rumors: 'I fear Yan people dig my city outer tombs, dishonor ancestors, can chill the heart.'
translations.idiomatic: Dan again spread false rumors: 'I fear Yan people dig my city outer tombs, dishonor ancestors, can chill the heart.'

context.previous: 城中人見齊諸降者盡劓，皆怒，堅守，唯恐見得。
context.next: 燕軍盡掘壟墓，燒死人。

translations.chinese: 燕軍盡掘壟墓，燒死人。
translations.literal: Yan army completely dug up mounds and tombs, burned corpses.
translations.idiomatic: Yan army completely dug up mounds and tombs, burned corpses.

context.previous: 單又縱反閒曰：「吾懼燕人掘吾城外冢墓，僇先人，可為寒心。」
context.next: 即墨人從城上望見，皆涕泣，俱欲出戰，怒自十倍。

translations.chinese: 即墨人從城上望見，皆涕泣，俱欲出戰，怒自十倍。
translations.literal: Jimu people from city walls saw, all wept, all wished to go out battle, anger increased tenfold.
translations.idiomatic: Jimu people from city walls saw, all wept, all wished to go out battle, anger increased tenfold.

context.previous: 燕軍盡掘壟墓，燒死人。

translations.chinese: 田單知士卒之可用，乃身操版插，與士卒分功，妻妾編於行伍之閒，盡散飲食饗士。
translations.literal: Tian Dan knowing soldiers usable, personally handled board and trowel, shared labor with soldiers, wives and concubines wove among ranks, completely distributed food and drink to feast soldiers.
translations.idiomatic: Tian Dan knowing soldiers usable, personally handled board and trowel, shared labor with soldiers, wives and concubines wove among ranks, completely distributed food and drink to feast soldiers.

context.next: 令甲卒皆伏，使老弱女子乘城，遣使約降於燕，燕軍皆呼萬歲。

translations.chinese: 令甲卒皆伏，使老弱女子乘城，遣使約降於燕，燕軍皆呼萬歲。
translations.literal: Ordered armored soldiers all hide, made old weak women ascend walls, sent envoys to arrange surrender to Yan. Yan army all called ten thousand years.
translations.idiomatic: Ordered armored soldiers all hide, made old weak women ascend walls, sent envoys to arrange surrender to Yan. Yan army all called ten thousand years.

context.previous: 田單知士卒之可用，乃身操版插，與士卒分功，妻妾編於行伍之閒，盡散飲食饗士。
context.next: 田單又收民金，得千溢，令即墨富豪遺燕將，曰：「即墨即降，願無虜掠吾族家妻妾，令安堵。」

translations.chinese: 田單又收民金，得千溢，令即墨富豪遺燕將，曰：「即墨即降，願無虜掠吾族家妻妾，令安堵。」
translations.literal: Tian Dan again collected people's gold, got thousand yi, had Jimu rich merchants send to Yan general: 'Jimu about to surrender, wish not to plunder our clans families wives concubines, let them dwell in peace.'
translations.idiomatic: Tian Dan again collected people's gold, got thousand yi, had Jimu rich merchants send to Yan general: 'Jimu about to surrender, wish not to plunder our clans families wives concubines, let them dwell in peace.'

context.previous: 令甲卒皆伏，使老弱女子乘城，遣使約降於燕，燕軍皆呼萬歲。
context.next: 燕將大喜，許之。

translations.chinese: 燕將大喜，許之。
translations.literal: Yan general greatly pleased, agreed.
translations.idiomatic: Yan general greatly pleased, agreed.

context.previous: 田單又收民金，得千溢，令即墨富豪遺燕將，曰：「即墨即降，願無虜掠吾族家妻妾，令安堵。」
context.next: 燕軍由此益懈。

translations.chinese: 燕軍由此益懈。
translations.literal: Yan army thus increasingly lax.
translations.idiomatic: Yan army thus increasingly lax.

context.previous: 燕將大喜，許之。

translations.chinese: 田單乃收城中得千餘牛，為絳繒衣，畫以五彩龍文，束兵刃於其角，而灌脂束葦於尾，燒其端。
translations.literal: Tian Dan collected city cattle over thousand, made crimson silk clothing, painted with five-colored dragon patterns, bound weapons on horns, poured oil and bundled reeds on tails, lit the ends.
translations.idiomatic: Tian Dan collected city cattle over thousand, made crimson silk clothing, painted with five-colored dragon patterns, bound weapons on horns, poured oil and bundled reeds on tails, lit the ends.

context.next: 鑿城數十穴，夜縱牛，壯士五千人隨其後。

translations.chinese: 鑿城數十穴，夜縱牛，壯士五千人隨其後。
translations.literal: Dug dozens of holes in city, night released cattle, strong warriors five thousand followed behind.
translations.idiomatic: Dug dozens of holes in city, night released cattle, strong warriors five thousand followed behind.

context.previous: 田單乃收城中得千餘牛，為絳繒衣，畫以五彩龍文，束兵刃於其角，而灌脂束葦於尾，燒其端。
context.next: 牛尾熱，怒而奔燕軍，燕軍夜大驚。

translations.chinese: 牛尾熱，怒而奔燕軍，燕軍夜大驚。
translations.literal: Cattle tails hot, angered and charged Yan army. Yan army night greatly alarmed.
translations.idiomatic: Cattle tails hot, angered and charged Yan army. Yan army night greatly alarmed.

context.previous: 鑿城數十穴，夜縱牛，壯士五千人隨其後。
context.next: 牛尾炬火光明炫燿，燕軍視之皆龍文，所觸盡死傷。

translations.chinese: 牛尾炬火光明炫燿，燕軍視之皆龍文，所觸盡死傷。
translations.literal: Cattle tail torches fire bright dazzling, Yan army saw all dragon patterns, touched all died injured.
translations.idiomatic: Cattle tail torches fire bright dazzling, Yan army saw all dragon patterns, touched all died injured.

context.previous: 牛尾熱，怒而奔燕軍，燕軍夜大驚。
context.next: 五千人因銜枚擊之，而城中鼓譟從之，老弱皆擊銅器為聲，聲動天地。

translations.chinese: 五千人因銜枚擊之，而城中鼓譟從之，老弱皆擊銅器為聲，聲動天地。
translations.literal: Five thousand thus silent attacked them, city drummed clamor followed, old weak all struck bronze for sound, sound shook heaven earth.
translations.idiomatic: Five thousand thus silent attacked them, city drummed clamor followed, old weak all struck bronze for sound, sound shook heaven earth.

context.previous: 牛尾炬火光明炫燿，燕軍視之皆龍文，所觸盡死傷。
context.next: 燕軍大駭，敗走。

translations.chinese: 燕軍大駭，敗走。
translations.literal: Yan army greatly terrified, defeated fled.
translations.idiomatic: Yan army greatly terrified, defeated fled.

context.previous: 五千人因銜枚擊之，而城中鼓譟從之，老弱皆擊銅器為聲，聲動天地。
context.next: 齊人遂夷殺其將騎劫。

translations.chinese: 齊人遂夷殺其將騎劫。
translations.literal: Qi people thus slaughtered their general Ji Jie.
translations.idiomatic: Qi people thus slaughtered their general Ji Jie.

context.previous: 燕軍大駭，敗走。
context.next: 燕軍擾亂奔走，齊人追亡逐北，所過城邑皆畔燕而歸田單，兵日益多，乘勝，燕日敗亡，卒至河上，而齊七十餘城皆復為齊。
